name: Project Neon - Ping Pong
description:
A cyberpunk themed bullethell platformer with puzzle mechanics.

[][][][][]

WASD

W = double jump

Space = wall jump

S = fall/no-slide

E = inventory

C = use wending machine for 100 orbs

Q = pickup item

R = restart game

[][][][][]

Game does not feature any known bugs currently.

All game mechanics have been made dynamically, not using one time solutions. Can be easily expanded. If the feedback is good, I will continue developing the game.

Game contains:

- Tutorial

- 1 Level

- Sounds & Soundtrack

- RPG Inventory system

- Main menu.

- Fully dynamic lighting system.

- Turrets, Jumppads, Deflectors

- Item system with rarities.

- Perfect movement collisions.

- Double jumps, walljumps and more.

Cut content: (If I continue to develop, planned features)

- Moving platforms

- Boss

- Co-op multiplayer

- More hazards ( way for player to die, etc lasers, saws, blades)

- More VFX

- Steam
